summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 VOLKSWAGEN PASSAT.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT SHE HAS RECEIVED TOO MANY RECALL NOTICES ON HER VEHICLE.  SHE HAS RECEIVED A TOTAL OF THREE NOTICES WITHIN THE LAST MONTH.  THE RECALL NUMBERS WERE UNAVAILABLE.  THERE HAD BEEN NO FAILURE TO DATE.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 59,000.   UPDATED10/26/07.*JB
